the invention relates to a new digital Arabic language and its input method and input tool.

the new digital language includes digitized global current languages and corresponding Braille and sign language, newly created interpersonal language and interpersonal Braille and sign language, and newly created interstellar language.

Language is the most important tool for human beings to exchange ideas and disseminate information; language is created for human communication and should not be a barrier for human communication.

Language in a broad sense, includes oral language and written language, and in a narrow sense, it only refers to oral language. Oral language is referred to as spoken language or colloquial language, and written language is referred to as written language, commonly referred to as writing.

spoken language or colloquial language

written language is referred to as written language, commonly referred to as writing.

Spoken language is transmitted orally and stored in people's memory relying on voice. Many spoken languages are lost in the long river of history with the passage of time; while written language is preserved and passed down through written symbols.

For a language that only has oral language it can create its own written language, that is, text, which records history

the new digital language inherits the phonology and expressive content of the language, and changes the writing form, retaining the root of the original language of human beings and highlighting the soul of the current language.

the unification of global languages can only be achieved if the unification of character-forming symbols of the current language is completed.

the new digital language has taken a solid first step to realize the unified language of all civilization, share the achievements of global integration, and jointly explore extraterrestrial civilizations.

the present invention aims at the deficiencies of the existing language technology, and provides a new language of ten Arabic digits from 0 to 9, covering the current global languages and corresponding Braille and sign language, newly created interpersonal language, Braille and sign language, and newly created interstellar language. And its input method and input tool.

the new digital language is a language that uses ten Arabic numerals from 0 to 9 as the unified character symbols of all languages (the character symbols are referred to as characters).

the newly created interpersonal language and corresponding Braille and sign language, and the newly created interstellar language are characterized in that the characters are ten Arabic numerals from 0 to 9 in the international universal code, and the phonetic symbols use ten consonants and vowels that are internationally interoperable, and the pronunciation in an internationally accepted note Mainly.

the writing method of ten Arabic numerals from 0 to 9 is the same all over the world, but the pronunciation is different in different countries and regions. It is a characteristic sound. Under the overall situation of unified pronunciation, people who use different languages can also pronounce their own characteristics. The sound is enough to reflect the unity of language and the combination of difference and diversity.

the characters of the digitized new language are divided into musical notes, semantic symbols and pictographs.

Musical note is the abbreviation of phonetic symbol, is the pronunciation part of a word, is an essential part, and a word can have no meaning symbol, pictograph, but can not have no musical note.

the notes of the digital new language classify the pronunciation characteristics of various current languages, retain the "charm" of the last syllable in the original language, inherit the phonological sense of the original language, the melody of music, traditional poetry, The beautiful rhythms of prose and other genres are not destroyed.

the digital new language also digitally records the pronunciations of the current various languages according to the "digital new language note table", only the notes are taken, and no meanings are taken; for any language, each word can record up to 3 syllables and 6 characters, of which the last One syllable is required, for example:

Semantic symbol is the abbreviation of semantic class symbol. Although the current human languages are different in font form, pronunciation, grammar, etc., regardless of the form of the language, the meanings expressed by them are related to each other, and the content is interlinked. Semantic categories are classified according to the meanings of words in different languages. The same semantic category has related meanings, and the same semantic symbols are used to connect various current languages. It runs through the ancient and modern times of various human languages and is the center that governs the meanings of all current languages. Nerves, in order to see the general meaning of the characters, similar to the role of the radicals of Chinese characters and the radicals of pinyin characters.

the identifiers of tokens are 1 meaning character is added above it, 2 meaning characters are added above the second meaning character, and the vowel of the meaning character has a long sound [:],

a symbol is an abbreviation for a symbol of a shape.

a pictograph is a supplementary component of a character. In the same language, it is added to avoid repetition of characters in a single character.

a pictograph is a character that can be saved.

Pictographs are the classification of basic letters or stroke shapes used in various languages, and basically reflect the sequence of letters and stroke shapes in various languages.

Braille is a communication tool for the visually impaired and an important means of participating in social life and receiving education. It is necessary to link the communication tools used by the visually impaired with those used by normal people to facilitate communication, communicate with each other, and promote understanding and trust.

New digital Braille is a kind of braille that uses braille characters to replace ten characters from 0 to 9 in the new digital language.

the new digital braille is referred to as new braille.

the new language of normal people corresponds, and the Braille of various countries is consistent with the language of normal people in this country.
